tool.name: Reverse
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** Input data must be TAB delimited. If the desired dataset does not appear in the input list, use *Text Manipulation->Convert* to convert it to **Tabular** type.
-----
**Syntax**
This tools reverses the order of columns in a tabular input file.
-----
**Example**
Input file::
Genes Sample Counts NOX1 A1 514 DcP A2 542 HH B3 490
Output file::
Counts Sample Genes 514 A1 NOX1 542 A2 DcP 490 B3 HH
-----
